body: So McZone 2 isn't working for me for two weeks now. Whenever I try to join McZone 2 this message appears: http://imgur.com/k7i5fj2  Is this problem only for me or anyone else experiencing it?
body_tagged: So McZone 2 isn't working for me for two weeks now. Whenever I try to join McZone 2 this message appears: http://imgur.com/k7i5fj2  Is this problem only for me or anyone else experiencing it?
title: McZone 02 Not Working

replies.body: It means a "Operator" Banned you from that server only xD, operators are usually ops :P so probably senior or +
replies.body_tagged: It means a "Operator" Banned you from that server only xD, operators are usually ops :P so probably senior or +

replies.body: @vladthegreat100 So how can I get unbanned?
replies.body_tagged: @vladthegreat100 So how can I get unbanned?

replies.body:
Some other people have had this problem before.

Since this doesn't log on your infractions or ban you from any other Avicus servers, a staff member couldn't have done this, the ban message you were given was a Vanilla ban message.

I will get in touch with Ivy to unban you.
replies.body_tagged:
Some other people have had this problem before.

Since this doesn't log on your infractions or ban you from any other Avicus servers, a staff member couldn't have done this, the ban message you were given was a Vanilla ban message.

I will get in touch with Ivy to unban you.

replies.body: In regards to servers not working, Neb05 is either broken or is an update/testing is in the works?

replies.body: Quite a few servers are acting a bit buggy.
